extendedInfo.description: âââââHAVE GREAT FUN WITH PHOTOSPowerCam is a powerful yet easy-to-use camera app. All the tools that you need to capture and share fantastic photos can be easily found right here in this elegant and easy-to-master Android app.âââââROCKS IN THE IOS COMMUNITYâ¢ "App Store BEST of 2012" at Apple App Store â¢ "Staff Favorites" at Apple App Storeâ¢ "App of the Week" at Apple App Storeâ¢ No.1 App in Photo/Video category or all categories in nearly 100 countriesâ¢ 1 Million Downloads in the first 7 daysâ¢ Over 30 Million Downloads in 6 monthsâââââFEATURESâCapture Photos with Real-time EffectsAdd real-time effects to photos while shooting. Simply switch between 36 effects like Old Photo, Lomo Cyan, for inspiration or simply for fun. âPanoramaSnap away in a semi-circle and the app will automatically combine your shots seamlessly into a great looking landscape. Also, add all those great effects to your panorama photos in real time, too!âColor SplashKeep a bit of color against black and white, or vice versa. Tap to switch between different color splash shooting modes and the app will do the rest.âTilt-ShiftChoose between Linear Mode for landscapes and Polar Mode for round objects. This technique plays with the focus of the lens in order to make your subject look like miniature.âTime LapseIntelligently recognize faces and start counting down - so you can just smile and look good.âSmile ShotDetect you smile and capture the photo automatically. This is the coolest and the easiest way for you to capture a portrait photo.âTouchTab on the viewfinder area to capture a photo directly.âAnti-ShakingStand on shaky and wanna capture great photo? Thatâs what Anti-Shaking will help you.âMultiple options to create awesome collageâ¢ Three ways to create collage: Template, Free and Join.â¢ Select suitable grid from plenty of templates.â¢ Set different ratio for photo.â¢ Change among lots of backgrounds and layouts.â¢ Adjust edge distance and corners.âIncredibly powerful toolsets for editingâ¢ Tap to enhance photo in secondsâ¢ Transform a soulless picture into a work of art with over 60+ effects and framesâ¢ Tap once to beautify portrait with Face Beautyâ¢ Crop or rotate your photo any way you like, and adjust Brightness/Contrast/Saturation/Sharpness to fine tune to your liking.âShare Almost Anywhereâ¢ Share single one or several photos in batch to Facebook, Twitter, Tumblr, etc.Feel free to reach us:Website: http://powercam.wondershare.com/ Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/PowerCamAppTwitter: https://twitter.com/#!/PowerCamAppInstagram: @PowerCam

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Thanks for removing the real time effect previews. I just got a new phone and they work on this one, but that\'s the one feature I\'d asked about in my previous review. 5 stars now, as promised. Amazing camera app!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fix the resolution, seriously
reviews.comment: The resolution for the front camera is horrible! Also the back camera never works. Please fix..
reviews.author: Priscilla Ahmed

reviews.title: Over all great
reviews.comment: It\'s a great app love the effects but it\'s kinda in convenient that it makes a shutter sound need to have the option to turn on or off but other than that no other camera comes close

reviews.title: Useless on Droid X2
reviews.comment: Hangs and heats up, but I never could take a picture.

reviews.title: Great app!
reviews.comment: Very user friendly and lots of fun. Love the collage function! :-)

reviews.title: Love it!
reviews.comment: I\'ve had this app for about 2 years! & I\'ve never deleted it! Great job!

reviews.title: Extraordinary

reviews.title: amazing
reviews.comment: at first I didn\'t use this much because it wasn\'t what I was expecting, but after taking some test shots and playing with the effects I was delighted. well worth having!

reviews.title: iLoveThisAppSoMuch.
reviews.comment: I had this app for a Long Time, more than a year. The filters are legit and it has very fine quality,  though...it is different compared to the one on my iPod touch, it has more features and it flashes when you take a pic on the front camera!  That\'s awesome!  Please put that for Androids, I would love to have a flash through my front camera screen. Thanks!  \342\235\244\302\240
reviews.author: Kassandra Rodriguez

reviews.title: Oh my word...
reviews.comment: I can\'t believe this is free and that there isn\'t millions of downloads. You have no idea how many of these apps I\'ve gone through! Untill now... This app functions beautifully, you have done an amazing job here. Top quality. Deserve way more than 5 stars!

reviews.comment: The back camera does not work properly. The photo shows up as vertical/diagonal lines. Doesn\'t matter how good the features are if the camera is useless. No response from developer...
